shellshocker

Class Boundary

  • java.lang.Object
    • shellshocker.Boundary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Location
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Doors, ElectricBounds, Platforms

    public abstract class Boundary
extends java.lang.Object
implements Location
    Creates boundaries which enemies and the user cannot move through.Boundary objects have attributes of location.
